name: Unity Productions Foundation
mission: In this 3-hour series for TV & streaming, a young Muslim Couple travels along historic Route 66, discovering their American roots and the many stories of Muslims enriching America. Along the way, they learn how Muslims are a part of American spirituality, food, technology, music and much more.
programs: The Great American Muslim Road Trip
UPF Film - The Sultan and the Saint
UPF Film - American Muslims: Facts vs. Fiction
theoryOfChange: Using the power of media and film-based dialogues to break down stereotypes, counter dehumanizing rhetoric, and enhance religious and cultural pluralism.

Founded in <cite id="2">1999</cite>, the organization leverages high-impact storytelling to improve social relations in America. Financially, the organization is robust, reporting <cite id="4">$2,774,622 in total revenue</cite> for the 2023 tax year.
